version_description:
New!
Weather Crave, providing the best in weather news, now available on your Apple Watch with:
- direct access to live geolocalised weather, as well as full day forecasts
- receipt of PUSH notifications directly to your Apple Watch

--

Performance improvements on Apple Watch

A breath of fresh air has come to the Weather Crave app:

- Meteolive is changing! Now, you can check the weather for the next 3 hours in 15 minute segments!
- Your favourites are now fully customisable: add an address, a place nearby etc
- Find and complete your “profile” for an app that better meets your requirements
- Want to watch Weather Crave TV? It’s now possible thanks to live streaming
- Tired of advertising? Don’t forget that advertising enables us to produce continuous forecasts written by meteorologists. Not convinced? Our VIP app is designed for you: an enhanced advertising-free version of the app!
- If you are on line, your Favourites can now be synchronised across all your IOS platforms
- Apple Watch compatible

A breath of fresh air has come to the Weather Crave app:

- Meteolive is changing! Now, you can check the weather for the next 3 hours in 15 minute segments!
- Your favourites are now fully customisable: add an address, a place nearby etc
- Find and complete your “profile” for an app that better meets your requirements
- Want to watch Weather Crave TV? It’s now possible thanks to live streaming
- Tired of advertising? Don’t forget that advertising enables us to produce continuous forecasts written by meteorologists. Not convinced? Our VIP app is designed for you: an enhanced advertising-free version of the app!
- If you are on line, your Favourites can now be synchronised across all your IOS platforms
- Apple Watch compatible

Update the application for:
- higher speed and more fluidity
- reduction in space requirement
- bug corrections and tweaks

We have prepared a nice little update for you :
- enrichment of the VIP offer with the “ultra-detailed weather” section
- correction of bugs, thanks to all those who kindly reported the few problems encountered
- and still improving the application’s performance
And if you are happy with this, which we hope, don’t hesitate to say so in the store and reward us with a few stars.

In this new update :
- correction of bugs, thanks to all those who kindly reported the few problems encountered
- and still improving the application’s performance
And if you are happy with this, which we hope, don’t hesitate to say so in the store and reward us with a few stars.

In this update, we have upgraded your Today Extension (notifications center widget) by adding the hour / hour weather for the next 6 hours.
Apple Watch owners will also benefit from improvements.
A Quick Action Extension, which can be used via the 3D-Touch on the application icon, will give you quick access to searching, sending photos and the Today Extension.

In this update, we have upgraded your Today Extension (notifications center widget) by adding the hour / hour weather for the next 6 hours.
Apple Watch owners will also benefit from improvements.
A Quick Action Extension, which can be used via the 3D-Touch on the application icon, will give you quick access to searching, sending photos and the Today Extension.

In this update, we have upgraded your Today Extension (notifications center widget) by adding the hour / hour weather for the next 6 hours.
Apple Watch owners will also benefit from improvements.
A Quick Action Extension, which can be used via the 3D-Touch on the application icon, will give you quick access to searching, sending photos and the Today Extension.

! To be immediately discovered!

As a sign of its transparency and efficiency, Weather Crave now lets you access the most used weather sources on a single screen thanks to the no.1 weather comparison service!
You no longer need to open 3 different apps to know the forecasts of other models: Weather Crave makes your life easier :)
This new exclusive function lets you view the 3 most consulted forecast models in France, the sources of which are: METEO CONSULT, Météo-France and NOAA (USA).

Download the app now!

We have prepared a small update to better assist you during your summer vacation.
- search upgrade: new filters based on your position, which will simplify your search.
- addition of more than 3000 new beaches accessible on the search screen
- faster access to the application's "home" page
- various corrections to bugs reported by some of you (extension, Apple Watch…)

- addition of more than 3000 new beaches accessible on the search screen

- various corrections to bugs reported by some of you (extension, Apple Watch…)

We have prepared a small update to better assist you during your summer vacation.
- search upgrade: new filters based on your position, which will simplify your search.
- addition of more than 3000 new beaches accessible on the search screen
- faster access to the application's "home" page
- various corrections to bugs reported by some of you (extension, Apple Watch…)

NEW FEATURES of the 5.6.0 version
Do you know about the “Observations” section? With this update, discover or rediscover this section which is now called “Chance of rain.”
We worked on the quality of the images displayed and the performance of the player to offer you more fluid observations.
And now, this observations video is enriched with “now casting” radar images to visualize the chances of precipitation over the next 90 minutes, which has never been done before!

To use it, download it now!

Our technical teams have prepared this update for you to make your favorite weather application faster, more convenient, more fluid … basically more essential !
We hope you'll love it :
- iPhone X support
- favorites edition rework
- multiple bugfixes

Hey! There's new stuff on your weather app, you really don't have any excuse for forgetting your umbrella ;-)
By reorganising the information, this new update will make navigation even easier.
But don't panic, you haven't lost any info, quite the contrary!

- the new section, "All the news", offers quick access to all types of editorial content, articles, videos and images.
- streaming is improved with VOD, so you can select and watch just the programmes you want, when you want!
- new weather forecast screens: the new interface makes it easier to go from live, to hourly, daily or 15 day forecasts.
- our R&D teams have also updated our forecasting model to improve its quality and accuracy (just like the one on the new website)!
- and still more places are being added, including villages and lots of other locations
- embedding the Picture in Picture feature on videos: video viewing is now possible outside the app on compatible devices
- compatibility with Airplay for broadcasting videos on TV screens
- preview function via 3D-Touch, to preview news and photos
- and finally, of course, different application optimisations

With this update, searching for your favourite place has never been so quick and easy! In addition to the classic search by name, you can add a map that you only need to position where you want to obtain a selection of targeted suggestions. And that's not all, with the search history, you can instantly find the last places you visited.  So, you see, you can't do without it ;-)

New: Your favourite weather app now includes a day and night mode. We've redesigned the
app to adapt to the time of day and offer you a better visual experience.
We also took this as an opportunity to revise some of the graphics, making it easier for you to
read the different weather information.
We hope many of you will like these changes.
The whole team is here to help. Contact us by email contact@meteoconsult.com or by
commenting here on the app store.
See you soon

Votre application météo préférée intègre désormais un mode jour et un mode nuit. L'application a été repensée graphiquement pour s'adapter au moment de consultation et vous offrir un meilleur confort visuel.
Nous en avons profité pour revoir certains éléments graphiques afin de vous faciliter la lecture des différents paramètres météo.
Nous espérons que vous serez nombreux à apprécier ces changements.
Toute l'équipe reste à votre écoute par mail contact@meteoconsult.com ou par commentaire sur ce store.
A très bientôt

Cette toute nouvelle mise à jour se met en conformité avec le nouvel IOS 14.5 mais ce n'est pas tout !
Suite à vos retours, nous avons amélioré la lisibilité des heures en Dark Mode, proposé le choix des unités de vent dans les réglages, désormais le son des vidéos en auto-play se met en arrière plan si vous utilisez déjà une application qui diffuse du son ainsi que de nombreuses petites améliorations pour une navigation toujours plus agréable.

La toute dernière mise à jour corrige un incident qui apparaissait sur certains téléphones ( affichage très régulier de la page de consentement). Votre confort de navigation reste notre principal objectif et nous vous remercions pour vos retours à contact@lachainemeteo.com ; nos équipes ont ainsi pu intervenir au plus vite.
